data.title: Hong Kong, India fuel blockbuster year for Asia fundraising
data.description: his year, the Hong Kong market became a beneficiary of China’s artificial-intelligence ambitions, advances in biotechnology, efforts by Beijing to boost domestic demand, and gains in global prices of gold and aluminIum
data.content: Not long ago, Hong Kongs share-sale market was a symbol of Chinas slowdown: Deal books were thin, investor sentiment was sour and bankers were fleeing the industry. This year, the script has flipped.… [+7941 chars]
